name: chillipad

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chilly pad
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa and an adapted version of the Chilipad temperature regulator, persons with enablement challenges may control their sleeping comfort without waking their caretaker.

This Skill is for Quadriplegic individuals to control their sleeping comfort by voice with an adapted version of the chilpad product by chili technology.

Available commands

Raise one degree - it will raise one degree
Raise five degree - it will raise five degree
Raise ten degree - it will raise ten degree
Reduce one degree - it will reduce one degree
Reduce five degree - it will reduce five degree
Reduce ten degree - it will reduce ten degree
Make toast - set maximum degree on chilly pad
Turn off - turn off chilly pad
Set temperature as 78 degree - set 78 degree on chilly pad
